charges.charge_description: Deft. did unlawfully possess a Heckler &; Koch (H&;K) Model USP,.40 caliber pistol; a Bushmaster Model XM15-E2S,.223 caliber Rifle, Serial #L068956; a Browning (Miroku) Model Medallion, 300 caliber Rifle, Serial #04569MZ351; a Glock Model 17, 9mm Caliber Pistol, Serial #DVZ434; a Ruger Model M77 Mark II, 30.06 Caliber Rifle, Serial #78189693; Remington Model 700,.270 Caliber Rifle, Serial #A6876466; a Winchester Model 70, 30-06 Caliber Rifle, Serial #G1171613; a Browning Model Medallion, 300 Caliber Rifle, Serial #84250NZ2M7; a Ruger Model 10/22,.22 Caliber Rifle, Serial #23460429; an Olympic Arms Model M.F.R.,.223/5.56mm (9mm) Caliber Rifle, bearing no serial number; and a Browning Arms Company Model BDA-380,.380 Caliber Pistol, Serial #05371, affecting interstate commerce, and has been previously convicted in a court of a crime punishiable by imprisonment for a term exceeding one year. 18:922(g)(1).
